description.en: Inspired by Joseph Merrick (aka the Elephant Man).

biography.en:
Alternative Names:  道満晴明, Douman Seiman, Iijima Susumu, 飯島進, Dowman Sayman

Birth:Mar 7
Years active:1993-Present
Hometown:Chiba, Japan

Doujin Circle: G Kun Dow (ジークンドー)

His current art style was directly influenced by Mike Mignola (Dowman is a fan of Hellboy).

An avid fan of horror movies (the witches in Voynich Hotel were named after an obscure Italian horror trilogy). After graduating from a design vocational school, he made his debut in the publishing section of BANDAI drawing manga for videogame anthologies.

His pen name is based on the two legendary onmyouji, Abe no Seimei and Ashiya Doman.
